author: adityapatwardhan
body:
## Steps to reproduce

Get-Item on a symbolic link. 
## Expected behavior

Mode property should be '-a---l' 
## Actual behavior

Mode property is '-a----'
## Environment data

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v0.6.0-112-g3276846c401e0c2132cc260f89752b121c81abde
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: This doesn't repro on `6.0.0-beta.1`, I believe it's been fixed.

title: Mode property for Symbolic links and junctions is expected to be '-a---l'
